node.doctext:
The editor of Horrorworld's Eulogies says:

I used Publishers Graphics. Here is my contact's information:

Sarah J. Stride
Project Manager
Publishers' Graphics
888.404.3769
Fax: 630.221.1870
www.pubgraphics.com
140 Della Ct.
Carol Stream, IL 60188
sstride@pubgraphics.com

Here's a break down of the printing costs:

Printing $1,032.56
Set-Up $40.00
Proof $20.00
Shipping $152.68

The print run was 300 (I think there were only 3 extra copies). There was also a $5 additional charge per page for changes.

Editor's Note: this works out to costs of $4.15 per copy. I can vouch that the book is attractive and is on decent paper.
node.title: horrorworld
